meaningMnemonic: How do you make a mnemonic for the word this? You don’t. But, we can try. You climb many <radical>hills</radical>. On top of one of the hills is a little <radical>drop</radical> of water. You pick it up and say “<kanji>THIS</kanji>… THIS IS WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR!”
readingMnemonic: You <reading>colle</reading>ct(これ) <kanji>this</kanji> very carefully. You’re going to add this to your drop collection.
